snippet: Warburg Pincus bought the eye care company for $3.7 billion at the peak of the buyout boom and has been reportedly seeking a valuation of up to $10 billion. But a figure like $8 billion makes more sense.
abstract: Warburg Pincus bought the eye care company for $3.7 billion at the peak of the buyout boom and has been reportedly seeking a valuation of up to $10 billion. But a figure like $8 billion makes more sense.
